mapper.select: select board.seq , board.name , board.id , board.email , board.subject , board.content , board.hit , board.logtime , board.bcode , reboard.rseq , reboard.seq , reboard.ref , reboard.lev , reboard.step , reboard.pseq , reboard.reply from board, reboard where board.seq = reboard.seq and board.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update reboard set reply = reply + 1 where seq = #{pseq}
